DOC.detailed_description: The study conduct Vesterbro Amager Copenhagen , Denmark , general practitioner medical practice area invite enter study . From patient list participate general practitioner person age 45-64 year identify baseline questionnaire mail person . The questionnaire information enter electronically general practitioner electronic chart system use Danish Quality Unit General Practice ( DAK-E ) system . Thus , questionnaire information provide general practitioner information electronic form health behavior , symptom socioeconomic information patient age group would normally access systematic way . Persons answer baseline questionnaire formal education randomly divide two group - one intervention group one control group . All person allocate intervention group receive personal invitation appoint health check general practitioner . The health check general practitioner include measurement weight , height , hip waist circumference , blood pressure , lung function , blood sugar , total cholesterol , thyroidal status . Participants abnormal screen health check , depend severity , either receive offer referral municipality health center lifestyle change program and/or follow procedure diagnostics treatment . For individual abnormal screen health behavior amenable intervention first health check additional health check schedule six month first health check .
